title: how to i earn points for ocean week

replies.body: Enlist on this site http://promo.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/oceanweek2016/ then play games vs humans.
We need to save Melbourne so the Australian open continues!!!

* Enlist on the site: http://promo.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/oceanweek2016/

* Win any matchmade game (versus humans)

> [{quoted}](name=Sephyre,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=zIxTipAh,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-01-22T23:39:58.061+0000)
>
> * Enlist on the site: http://promo.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/oceanweek2016/
> 
> * Win any matchmade game (versus humans)

like aram etc
there's also a tab in the client which is showing info on the progress we're making
